segments.text: Depending on what you consider a lot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Couple times a week . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Only when I go out . I'm not a big drinker .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm usually drinking all night long . At least 10 drinks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't you spend a lot of money then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . We usually go to places that have specials . Dante's over on the Ave has $ 5.00 pitchers on Mondays . So for ten , fifteen bucks , I can get a lot of drinks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you don't like beer , have you tried mixed drinks ? Some of them are pretty good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like beer , it's just that I get a headache when I drink more than 3 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You just have to build up a tolerance . I used to be like that . But your body gets used to it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It'll take awhile , but I'm working on it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hey let's go out tomorrow night . The Ram Bar and Grill is having a special on pitchers .
segments.speaker: S2
